H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H884.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:Negeb<SDBH:נֶגֶב>}, at the southern border of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► used esp. in combination with {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>} at the northern border of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} to refer to all Israel

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1060.def: = first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H938.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H758.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as the founder of a land and ethnic group with the same name

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3777.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}, brother of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ► possibly regarded as ancestor of {L:Chaldeans<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>}

H1328.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}, brother of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ► father of {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}
= man; ◄ descendant of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}, brother of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ► father of {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7259.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Bethuel<SDBH:בְּתוּאֵל>}; sister of {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>}; ► wife of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; mother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>} and {L:Jakob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8083.def: = state in which a countable entity is eight in number

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H6370.def: = a woman who lives with a man but has lower status than his wife or wives

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H7208.def: = woman; ► {L:concubine<SDBH:פִּילֶגֶשׁ>} of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}, {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}'s brother; mother of {L:Tebah<SDBH:טֶבַח>}, {L:Gaham<SDBH:גַּחַם>}, {L:Tahash<SDBH:תַּחַשׁ>}, and {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2875.def: = causative action by which humans kill animals by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp-bladed instrument, ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression

H1514.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}, brother of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}, by {L:Reumah<SDBH:רְאוּמָה>} his {L:concubine<SDBH:פִּילֶגֶשׁ>}

H8477.def: = large animal of about 3 meters (10 feet) long, which lives in the sea, usually in small herds of twelve to fifteen animals; they swim slowly and feed in fairly shallow water on underwater weeds near mouths of rivers; they sometimes even move a short distance up the river; they need to come to the surface every few minutes to breathe, and they sometimes come out of the water to lie on rocks or sandbanks;◄ |iDugong dugong|i*; ► their skins make very good leather
